org.ardenus.input

Class InputUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.input.InputUtils

  • public final class InputUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores frequently used functions for input and can be used to easily get percentages, calculate analog stick data, etc.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • getUsbDevice

        public static final javax.usb.UsbDevice getUsbDevice(int vendor,
                                                     int product)
                                              throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                     javax.usb.UsbException
        Returns the first device found with the specified vendor and product ID.
        Parameters:
        vendor - the vendor id.
        product - the product id.
        Returns:
        the device that was found, null if no device was found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - thrown if an error related to security occurs.
        javax.usb.UsbException - thrown if an error related to USB devices occurs.

      • getUsbDevices

        public static final javax.usb.UsbDevice[] getUsbDevices(int vendor,
                                                        int product)
                                                 throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                                                        javax.usb.UsbException
        Returns all of the devices found with the specified vendor and product ID.
        Parameters:
        vendor - the vendor id.
        product - the product id.
        Returns:
        the devices that were found as a UsbDevice, null if no device was found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - thrown if an error related to security occurs.
        javax.usb.UsbException - thrown if an error related to USB devices occurs.

      • claimUsbInterface

        public static final javax.usb.UsbInterface claimUsbInterface(javax.usb.UsbDevice device,
                                                             int configuration,
                                                             javax.usb.UsbInterfacePolicy policy)
                                                      throws javax.usb.UsbClaimException,
                                                             javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException,
                                                             javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException,
                                                             javax.usb.UsbException
        Claims an interface for the specified device.
        Parameters:
        device - the device.
        configuration - the configuration.
        policy - the claim policy.
        Returns:
        the claimed interface.
        Throws:
        javax.usb.UsbClaimException - thrown if there was an error when claiming the device.
        javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException - thrown if the device is not active.
        javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException - thrown if the device is disconnected.
        javax.usb.UsbException - thrown if an error related to USB devices occurs.

      • openPipe

        public static final javax.usb.UsbPipe openPipe(javax.usb.UsbInterface iface,
                                               int endpoint)
                                        throws javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException,
                                               javax.usb.UsbNotClaimedException,
                                               javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException,
                                               javax.usb.UsbException
        Opens an endpoint pipe for the specified interface.
        Parameters:
        iface - the interface.
        endpoint - the endpoint.
        Returns:
        the opened pipe.
        Throws:
        javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException - thrown if the device is not active.
        javax.usb.UsbNotClaimedException - thrown if the device is not claimed.
        javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException - thrown if the device is disconnected.
        javax.usb.UsbException - thrown if an error related to USB devices occurs.

      • sendData

        public static final void sendData(javax.usb.UsbPipe pipe,
                                  byte... data)
                           throws javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException,
                                  javax.usb.UsbNotOpenException,
                                  javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException,
                                  javax.usb.UsbException
        Sends data to the specified pipe.
        Parameters:
        pipe - the pipe to send the data to.
        data - the data to send.
        Throws:
        javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException - thrown if the device is not active.
        javax.usb.UsbNotOpenException - thrown if the device is not open.
        javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException - thrown if the device is disconnected.
        javax.usb.UsbException - thrown if an error related to USB devices occurs.

                                       javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException,
                                       javax.usb.UsbException

        Parameters:
        pipe - the pipe to send the data to.
        data - the data to send.
        Throws:
        javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException - thrown if the device is not active.

      • readData

        public static final byte[] readData(javax.usb.UsbPipe pipe,
                                    int length)
                             throws javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException,
                                    javax.usb.UsbNotOpenException,
                                    javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException,
                                    javax.usb.UsbException
        Reads data the specified amount of data from a pipe.
        Parameters:
        pipe - the pipe to read from.
        length - the amount of bytes to read.
        Returns:
        the bytes that were read.
        Throws:
        javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException - thrown if the device is not active.
        javax.usb.UsbNotOpenException - thrown if the device is not open.
        javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException - thrown if the device is not connected.
        javax.usb.UsbException - thrown if an error related to USB devices occurs.

      • readDataAsync

        public static final void readDataAsync(javax.usb.UsbPipe pipe,
                                       int length)
                                throws javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException,
                                       javax.usb.UsbNotOpenException,
                                       javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException,
                                       javax.usb.UsbException
        Reads data the specified amount of data from a pipe asynchronously. This does not return any data since the function is asynchronous and will return immediately. In order to get the data returned from this function, a UsbPipeListener must be used.
        Parameters:
        pipe - the pipe to read from.
        length - the amount of bytes to read.
        Throws:
        javax.usb.UsbNotActiveException - thrown if the device is not active.
        javax.usb.UsbNotOpenException - thrown if the device is not open.
        javax.usb.UsbDisconnectedException - thrown if the device is not connected.
        javax.usb.UsbException - thrown if an error related to USB devices occurs.
